title: What part of a paragraph contains the controlling idea? - Quora

response.answer_text: The topic sentence, almost always the first sentence. Every sentence after that is a “supporting sentence” that expands, explains, or clarifies the topic. “Africa is the continent with the most diverse wildlife. From camels in the searing Sahara to tiny deer in the Congo to the seals off Cape Hope, animals abound…” Next idea > new topic sentence > new paragraph.
